description: Details required by Condition 5 (Manufacturers Details of Living Roof) of Planning Permission 21/03266/HOU (Partial demolition of existing single-storey rear extension with erection of new single-storey rear extension and associated changes to fenestration. Render to first floor front elevation. New boundary fence/wall and gate to front. Landscaping to front courtyard. Installation of new Solar Panels and air source heat pump)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to the proposed plant species, its size, maturity and layout and maintenance of the proposed living roof. Therefore the proposal fails to demonstrate that the living roof would be properly implemented and maintained in the interest of visual amenity, in conflict with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
